1.0.name: wordpress/google-places
1.0.description:
\"Google Places\" also known as \"Google Maps\" is a great way to find local business near your city. If you need more visibility in local search results,Maps and earth this plugin is a must.  

Google Places plugin is designed specifically for Business owners to help optimize their business listing on Google Search , Places and earth. Google Places plugin is designed to help your business increase in visibility on google Local searches , maps and Google Earth. Things to use while optimizing Google Places for Local Seo and Local Google maps

(1) Use the same business name , Address , Phone as used in google Places listing.

(2) Add the same details in your contact us Page.

(3) Include link to local.kml file in Home Page - Makes it Easy for google To crawl your KML file

If you have any questions or queries about local seo feel free to mail me at ritesh@innovative
